main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a round, white object in the sky over Euclid, Ohio on June 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed at an estimated altitude of 10,000 to 15,000 feet.,The sighting lasted for twenty minutes.,The object was the size of the head of a pin held at arm's length.,The object was moving southwest.,No further investigation was authorized due to the improbability of uncovering significant data.
